<style>
.match-schedule {
  width: 100%;
  background: #1e293b;
  padding: 16px;
  color: white;
  font-family: sans-serif;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  max-width: 840px; /* Sesuaikan max-width agar lebih konsisten */
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto; /* Agar posisi selalu di tengah */
}

.schedule-table {
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
  border-collapse: collapse;
}

.team-info {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 20px;
  flex-wrap: nowrap;
}

.team-name {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.team-logo {
  width: 3rem;
  height: 3rem;
  object-fit: contain;
  border-radius: 6px;
}

.time-cell {
  padding: 8px;
}

.time {
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  color: #38bdf8;
}

.countdown {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: #facc15;
  margin-top: 12px;
  text-align: center;
  padding-top: 12px;
  padding-bottom: 12px;
  background-color: #111827;
  border-radius: 8px;
  width: 80%;
  max-width: 500px;
}

a:link {
  text-decoration: none;
}

.hidden-link {
  display: none;
}

.button-cell {
  text-align: center;
  padding-top: 12px;
}

.play-button {
  background-color: #10b981;
  border: none;
  color: white;
  padding: 10px 16px;
  margin: 5px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: background 0.3s;
}

.play-button:hover {
  background-color: #059669;
}

.live {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: #ff0000;
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Responsif tablet ke bawah */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .team-name {
    font-size: 0.75rem !important;
    margin: 0px;
  }

  .team-logo {
    width: 2rem !important;
    height: 2rem !important;
  }

  .time {
    font-size: 0.85rem !important;
    margin: 0px;
    padding: 0px;
  }

  .countdown {
    font-size: 0.9rem !important;
    padding: 8px !important;
    width: 90% !important;
    max-width: none !important;
  }

  .play-button {
    font-size: 0.85rem !important;
    padding: 8px 12px !important;
  }

  .live {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }

  .team-info {
    gap: 3px;
  }
}

/* Responsif mobile kecil (â‰¤ 480px) */
@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .match-schedule {
    padding-top: 8px !important;
    padding-left: 2px !important;
    padding-right: 2px !important;
    padding-bottom: 8px !important;
    margin-top: 30px !important;
  }

  .team-name {
    font-size: 0.95rem !important;
  }

  .team-logo {
    width: 1.8rem !important;
    height: 1.8rem !important;
  }

  .time {
    font-size: 1rem !important;
    padding: 3px !important;
  }

  .countdown {
    font-size: 0.8rem !important;
    width: 85% !important;
    margin: 12px !important;
  }

  .play-button {
    font-size: 0.75rem !important;
    padding: 6px 10px !important;
    margin: 3px !important;
  }

  .live {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
  }

  .team-info {
    gap: 3px !important; /* Tetap horizontal, tapi beri jarak kecil */
    flex-wrap: nowrap !important; /* Jangan pecah ke bawah */
  }
}

.vpn-info {
  background-color: #0f172a;
  color: #e2e8f0;
  padding: 16px;
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 12px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 20px auto;
  box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.2);
  font-family: sans-serif;
  line-height: 1.6;
  border: 1px solid #334155;
}

.vpn-info .highlight {
  color: #60a5fa;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.vpn-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: nowrap;

  gap: 12px;

}

.vpn-button {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;

  gap: 6px;

  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  text-decoration: none !important;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  transition: background-color 0.3s;
  white-space: nowrap;
  flex: 1 1 30%;

}

.vpn-button:hover {

@media (max-width: 480px) {

  }

  .vpn-button .icon {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
  }
}

.icon {
  width: 24px;   /* atau ukuran yang kamu inginkan */
  height: 24px;  /* disarankan disamakan dengan width agar proporsional */
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle; /* agar sejajar dengan teks */
}
</style>
